info.title: Readable API
info.description: Comprehensive suite of tools to evaluate text readability and extract key readability metrics. Calculates multiple readability indices including Flesch Reading Ease, Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level, Gunning Fog Index, SMOG Index, and more, along with key structural metrics. Supports multiple languages: en, de, es, fr, it, ru.

post.description: Evaluates text readability and returns comprehensive metrics including Flesch Reading Ease, Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level, Gunning Fog Index, SMOG Index, Automated Readability Index, Coleman-Liau Index, Dale-Chall Readability Score, and structural metrics like syllable count, word count, and sentence count. Ideal for content customization, SEO optimization, educational tools, and writing assistants.

text.description: The text to analyze for readability metrics, e.g.: This is awesome

lang.description: Language of the text. Supported languages: en (English), de (German), es (Spanish), fr (French), it (Italian), ru (Russian). Defaults to en if not specified.
